thread.title: Coding camp offers scholarship for North Korean refugees

author: Marissa Lang
title: Coding camp offers scholarship for North Korean refugees
text:
Photo: Couresty Of LINK Headshot of Hannah Song, CEO of Liberty in North Korea (LINK) Headshot of Hannah Song, CEO of Liberty in North Korea (LINK)
The moment he stepped across the North Korean border, the young refugee had more than entered a different country: He had entered a new era. Headshot of Hannah Song, CEO of Liberty in North Korea (LINK) Headshot of Hannah Song, CEO of Liberty in North Korea (LINK)
The moment he stepped across the North Korean border, the young refugee had more than entered a different country: He had entered a new era.
